Reviews.Title: LG Prada P940 3.0
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! Very elegant-looking phone. Works with T-mobile network, although I had to add an APN in order to receive picture texts (I found how to do it from youtube).  Overall I am very satisfied with this phone.

Reviews.Title: LG Prada 3.0
Reviews.Author: Suriya
Reviews.Content: The device LG Prada 3.0 is good and brand new & its stable enough for development. Both Wifi & 3G works fine including WIFI hotspot.

Reviews.Title: LG prada
Reviews.Author: Zi Di Tam
Reviews.Content: Got the phone fast, material looks slick. It doesn't feel cheap at all great buy for the phone and very good pricing. Only problem I had is with my network. Had to change the frequency and tweaked it a bit. There are easy how to on google on how to change it. Other than that it works great!

Reviews.Title: A bra-dah with a Prada!!
Reviews.Author: 5TYLN from Ko'Olina HI
Reviews.Content: Very late with my review response but who isn't fashionably late now days. First off' ..I love my Prada by LG cell phone!! It feels very sleek and quality based when held in your hand. It has definitely been a conversation piece every time someone notices the Prada label on the back of the device.What makes owing a device such as the Prada by LG so amazing, is the exclusiveness of having one. There hasn't been one person to date that I personal came across or heard of that owns a designer cell phone. It defiantly gives you the prestige (if your into high end, quality items) that you want.Aside from the well enjoyed physical appearance of my Prada, I must say the 4.0 ice cream sandwich OS is quite the feature to have. It gives the device all the tools it needs to maintain productivity and performance, while keeping you fashionable. The front camera captures you in the best light ever, no matter how you look. A big thanks to the developers for including the "beautiful skin" option.The only downfall of the device, is the battery life spand. If you don't keep your display screen brightness on the lowest settings, it tends to shorten the battery life really quickly. I work in Real Estate so, having a full charged cell phone is crucial. Besides that, I encourage everyone to invest, gift or own a designer phone. It's sets you apart from the common expectations of others.Last but not least, the service leading up to receiving my phone. Unfortunately, I was one of those shoppers who made online purchases on Black Friday who hasn't received their shipment as promised. However, to make a long story short, I was given a ETA of receiving my order before Christmas but ended up receiving it on New Years Eve.After corresponding with Scharter Store,  I was pleasantly surprised on how they handled my situation. At first I was taken back by their first email response to my concern of not receiving my order on time. They offered me two choices, First choice was a refund of $20.00 for the delay with the option for me to wait until the original shipment arrives (which they could not locate) Second choice was to cancel my order with a full refund.Quite honestly, I was not interested in either option that was offered. I originally found it to be insensitive and offensive. However, I was surprised with the next day option that they provided me. It was a $20.00 refund, plus a expedited shipment of a new order (which they claimed at first, there warehouse was out of stock) . Being heard and having my concerns respected with a positive compromised defiantly assured me that I was dealing with a good company.Would I recommend Scharter Store - YES! Would I recommend getting the Prada by LG- YES!!!

Reviews.Title: Dead Battery after 2 months!
Reviews.Author: M. Hill
Reviews.Content: The mb phone it's self is really nice, the wife loved it. After just 2 months the battery died on her.Had a lot of trouble finding a replacement battery locally. So I ordered one from here at Amazon.So long was the original search to find one at home, we gave up for a while and I had to buy my wife yet another mb phone.Bit of a let down to be honest, just bad luck I guess.Don't even ask me about the delivery of the phone! Thats another story.

Reviews.Title: Repeat purchase
Reviews.Author: sasinla
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.I also love my iPhone.The android platform and the technical specs make this a great smartphone.Better camera than the iPhone.I like the google play store and the ease of use with my biz related documents, apps and flash player.Also great for social media.

Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: Very unconvinient phone(. I can not properly use it, because touch screen is impossibly slow. I will never advise it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: All good , except one thing -no official ICS
Reviews.Author: Alexey
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my wife and she likes it, at least she did not see the same phone around, like exclusive thing. I thought she may like "mirror" button , but she doesn't use it at all, because front camera distort real picture, some kind of "fish eye" lens. As for me, I placed 4 stars, because there is no official version of Android 4 ICS , even hardware  supports it.

Reviews.Title: luv it
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: It's freaking sweet, it arrived way before the due date, and I just love the design, look, and feel of it.

Reviews.Title: LG Prada 3.0
Reviews.Author: Mr. Sven Hansen "Coffee Guy"
Reviews.Content: Amazing phone, good features, I like it better than I phone. Only problem is that internet streams too slow in the U.S.

Reviews.Title: never buy from AMAZON for cell phone
Reviews.Author: music lover
Reviews.Content: AMAZON only gives 90 days warranty for cell phone. but LG doesn't provide manufacture's warranty for the selling from AMAZON. so after 90 days, if there is any problem on the phone, no one will take care of your cell phone. so NEVER buy the cell phone from AMAZON. this is the only way to get you out of the trouble and avoid wasting money and time with AMAZON.I got the LG phone end of last November. the phone didn't work since April. until now, I have been told that no one could help to fix the phone even. I waste the money and energy to deal with problem since April. this is ridiculous. so the only way to keep yourself out of this kind of trouble is not to buy from AMAZON

Reviews.Title: cell phone sucks
Reviews.Author: JULIE OUN
Reviews.Content: the battery never charges complete. the cellphone turns off by itself and i have to take the battery out to turn it back on.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Benny T.
Reviews.Content: I love this phone and I'm so glad I bought it! After the iPhone 5 came out I wasn't jealous at all because I practically had all the same features like panoramic camera and such. I also found out I have the MFC feature that the new Samsung Galaxy has too which is awesome! I'm really glad I bought it despite the different band it had at the time because T-Mobile now supports it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: Trent
Reviews.Content: Yes, you're probably interested in it because it's a ultrachic fashion brand, but really it's a top-of the line (for its generation) LG phone.  I'd say this industrial design on it is awesome, however the Prada-inspired skin/flavor of Android 2.3.7 Gingerbread is not great.  So, if you can find a way to put ICS or Cyanogenmod on it you'd have yourself a stylish iPhone-killer.

Reviews.Title: It's beatifull
Reviews.Author: Jorge Alberto
Reviews.Content: It is a very good product I love. What recomiento, I regret having bought. My son loves it. Thank you.
